Articles.Content:
Light SSTO craft. perfect balance for training Hypersonic flight. no mods used, not FAR optimized.

the rar includes 6 planes, the X-1A (not orbit capable) Falcon XSP, Falcon T, Falcon C, Falcon M, Falcon XME
